name: Koya Hasa
description: There are a few small boats along the docks. You can see schools of fish swimming in the water below. A newly-built building hangs out from the edge of the shore. It's large enough for a cargo ship to unload inside.

unlockableAreas.buttonText: Take an artisan boat to Ufagari

buildings.name: Artisan Guild Factory
buildings.description: The building is quite expansive. It surrounds the water so boats can dock inside. An important looking man is sitting by a booth near the door, writing very excitedly in a notebook.

name: Manayo Village
description: The village is small but vibrant. Colorful flowers adorn the doorways and paths that weave between buildings. There is a small boat service providing tours into the small adjacent lake.

buildings.name: Sword Seller Hut
buildings.description: The walls of the hut are lined with various weapons, mostly swords. A man stands behind a display case of a number of purchasable swords.

buildings.name: Kumuhana's House
buildings.description: You find a man sitting at the firepit, grinding some grain with a quern-stone.

name: Laau Kaila
description: It's hard to see ahead or behind as you step between the sturdy, thin trees that make up the majority of the forest. At last you find a small clearing with a small hut.

buildings.name: Forest Hut
buildings.description: Inside the hut is a small, single room. An old man sits at a table reading a book.

name: Wana Tona Lake
description: The lake is dark and deep. Here and there bubbles emerge from the waters. Something very large lives under here. A wall of unreasonably tall reeds blocks off the northern part of the lake. At the southern shore, a lone hut sits a few feet into the water.

buildings.name: Water Hall
buildings.description: The hut seems somehow larger on the inside. The main room leads into a gushing fountain, flowing out of the floor and into a drain at the back of the room. There's an alchemical pool here.

name: Sotu Nran
description: A small waterfall emerges from the side of the hill behind it.
